Title: The People in Your Neighborhood
Plot: Allison's visions about the convicted sex offender new to her neighborhood have her questioning his guilt, even though her neighbors are furious about him moving in. Plus, Joe's potential career opportunity doesn't mesh with Allison's professional future.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
